title: Medical History Data Transfer Object
description: A DTO that represents a patient's medical history record.

id.description: The unique identifier of the medical history record.

type.description: The type of medical history entry (e.g., diagnosis, treatment).

history.description: A detailed description of the medical history entry.

patientId.description: The unique identifier of the patient to whom this record belongs.

dateRecorded.description: The date and time when this record was created or recorded.
